name: Healing Potion
description:
Follow Dianthe on her adventure to find the ingredients to brew a healing potion.

-=x=-=x=-=x=-=x=-=x=-

Greetings! This is a small Twine story I wrote for a Creative Writing course for my academy. It may receive some updates in the future, like images and BGM.

Criticism and bug-reports are very appreciated!

Hope you enjoy  :)
